verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3212"\w* Abimelech \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* \f + \fr 9:1 \ft Jerubbaal is another name for Gideon and probably means let Baal contend; here and throughout this chapter; see Judges 6:32.\f* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother’s \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother,

“\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* ask \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, ‘\w Is|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w*?’ \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w your|strong="H3605"\w* own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* blood.”

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother’s brothers \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* follow Abimelech, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* brother.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w shekels|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \f + \fr 9:4 \ft 70 shekels is approximately 1.76 pounds or 797.8 grams of silver.\f* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Baal-berith|strong="H1170"\w*, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* Abimelech \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* some \w worthless|strong="H7386"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w reckless|strong="H6348"\w* men \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* stone \w murdered|strong="H2026"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \w survived|strong="H3498"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* himself.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Beth-millo \w gathered|strong="H7927"\w* \w beside|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oak \f + \fr 9:6 \ft Or terebinth or great tree\f* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5324"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* proceeded \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w make|strong="H4427"\w* Abimelech \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. Jotham’s Parable

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w*, \w he|strong="H7121"\w* climbed \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w*, \w raised|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w*: “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w may|strong="H8085"\w* God \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w One|strong="H4427"\w* day \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w set|strong="H4427"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* said \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, ‘\w Reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* replied, ‘\w Should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w stop|strong="H2308"\w* giving \w my|strong="H5921"\w* oil \w that|strong="H6086"\w* \w honors|strong="H3513"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* God \w and|strong="H1980"\w* man, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w hold|strong="H2308"\w* sway \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?’

Then \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, ‘\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* replied, ‘\w Should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w stop|strong="H2308"\w* giving \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sweetness|strong="H4987"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w fruit|strong="H8570"\w*, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w hold|strong="H2308"\w* sway \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?’

Then \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* grapevine, ‘\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* grapevine replied, ‘\w Should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w stop|strong="H2308"\w* giving \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* \w that|strong="H6086"\w* \w cheers|strong="H8055"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* God \w and|strong="H1980"\w* man, \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w hold|strong="H2308"\w* sway \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*?’

Finally \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thornbush, ‘\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thornbush replied, ‘If \w you|strong="H5921"\w* really \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4886"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* find \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w*. \w But|strong="H4428"\w* if \w not|strong="H3318"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* fire \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thornbush \w and|strong="H4428"\w* consume \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* if \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* faithfully \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w honestly|strong="H8549"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w making|strong="H6213"\w* Abimelech \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, if \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w well|strong="H2895"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* if \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w deserves|strong="H1576"\w*—

\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* father \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w risked|strong="H7993"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single stone, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H4427"\w* Abimelech, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* maidservant, \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* brother—

\w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* faithfully \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w honestly|strong="H8549"\w* \w toward|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* Abimelech, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*.

But if \w not|strong="H3318"\w*, \w may|strong="H1004"\w* fire \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* Abimelech \w and|strong="H1004"\w* consume \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Beth-millo, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w may|strong="H1004"\w* fire \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Beth-millo \w and|strong="H1004"\w* consume Abimelech.”

Then \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* \w ran|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, escaping \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Beer, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* brother Abimelech. Gaal Conspires with the Shechemites

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* Abimelech \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w reigned|strong="H7786"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*,

\w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* animosity \f + \fr 9:23 \ft Or a harmful spirit\f* \w between|strong="H7307"\w* Abimelech \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* caused \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* treat Abimelech deceitfully,

\w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crime|strong="H1818"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* \w might|strong="H3378"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* justice \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* avenged \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* brother Abimelech \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w helped|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w murder|strong="H2026"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* ambush \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Abimelech \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hilltops, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w robbed|strong="H1497"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w*. \w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Abimelech.

Meanwhile, \w Gaal|strong="H1603"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ebed|strong="H5651"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H5674"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w into|strong="H5674"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w leaders|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* \w put|strong="H5674"\w* their confidence \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H5674"\w*.
